title: Suzuki Motorcycle India partners with SMFG India Credit Co for vehicle finance
description: Suzuki Motorcycle India Pvt Ltd partners with SMFG India Credit Co Ltd to provide financing on purchase of its two-wheelers. SMFG India Credit is a registered NBFC-ICC with the Reserve Bank of India and a member of SMFG. SMIPL aims to offer flexible retail finance offers to cater to the needs of its growing customer base. The partnership allows SMIPL customers to avail of round-the-clock retail financing options with quick loan sanction and hassle-free documentation.
